response.overview: Fiddle on a cornstalk??!! You bet!!! Everyday objects are turned into instruments of Eric's orchestra in this fun-filled video: and everyone can join in! Spoons, combs, tin can bongos, a musical saw, washtub bass and jew's harp are but a few of the unlikely musical treats that Eric shows how to build and play. His irresistable [sic] tunes and outlandish sense of humour will have your family clapping, signing and playing along as part of Eric's hilarious ensemble.  So join in, or as Eric would say: "It don't take no fancy music degree, any fool can do it, just look at ME!"
response.title: Making Music With Eric Nagler
